text: I have a question related to PkgPage. Maybe I am using it wrongly but I am aiming at having multiple pages :D My problem is that the "sections" get added to one another, is there a smarter trick then just resetting the `sections` variable to an empty array at the beginning of each page?

elements.text: I have a question related to PkgPage. Maybe I am using it wrongly but I am aiming at having multiple pages :D My problem is that the "sections" get added to one another, is there a smarter trick then just resetting the
variable to an empty array at the beginning of each page?

text: hahaha PkgPage is not meant to be used like this, what I'd suggest is that you use the basic layout scaffolding that you like with bootstrap and that you ignore PkgPage as you'll have to battle it multiple times to get the navbar right etc
